pages.title: Piglin Bartering
pages.text: Like you'd expect, you can trade with $(thing)Piglins$() in the same way you trade with them in vanilla, with $(item)Gold Ingots$().

pages.name: Piglin
pages.text: You can find Piglins in almost every biome throughout the Beneath.

pages.title: Bastions
pages.text: Raiding a $(thing)Bastion$() might be very dangerous, but they can also be very rewarding! You can find things like:$(li)Gold, Rose Gold, Pig Iron, Black Bronze, and Silver ingots$(li)Black Bronze weapons, tools, and armor$(li)Kaolin clay and graphite$(li)Permanent light sources$(li)Cloth, leather, seeds, and food$(li)And other treasures!

pages.title: Piglin Disguise
pages.text: If you want to ensure an easy time trading--or simply mingling with the locals--Put on a $(thing)Piglin Disguise$() to prevent $(thing)Piglins$() from being hostile with you on first sight. But beware! They only put up with so much...
